products.title: Antique White & Oyster Wooden Blind With Tapes - 64mm Slat
products.description: Such a beautiful look, this antique white and oyster wooden blind offers gentle soft colour, the faded cream slat is perfectly complemented by the darker oyster tape for complete harmony. As well as looking totally stylish this blind also offers fantastic practicality; the w such a beautiful look, this antique white and oyster wooden blind offers gentle soft colour, the faded cream slat is perfectly complemented by the darker oyster tape for complete harmony.

products.title: Pure White & White Wooden Blind With Tapes - 64mm Slat
products.description: This pure white and white wooden blind features their widest slat, with 64mm perfectly echoing the look of a plantation shutter. The wide slat allows lots of light in as well as a fantastic view out. Making a wonderful feature at the window this blind is simply coloured yet bur this pure white and white wooden blind features their widest slat, with 64mm perfectly echoing the look of a plantation shutter.

products.title: Marta Chalk Roman Blind
products.description: Our marta chalk roman blind is the epitome of elegance and grace. The off-white, cream shading of the blind will give your room a chic and clean look, perfect for those wanting to create a tranquil and magical environment. The versatile colour will look fabulous in most home their marta chalk roman blind is the epitome of elegance and grace.

products.title: Choices Madelyn Linen Chalk White Roller Blind
products.description: Fresh florals bring a wonderful feeling to a space, and this choices madelyn linen chalk white roller blind is just as good as the real thing, if not better. The blooming flower heads in beautiful white always feel fresh. Pair it with a soft neutral background and linen mix f fresh florals bring a wonderful feeling to a space, and this choices madelyn linen chalk white roller blind is just as good as the real thing, if not better.

products.title: Snowdrop Dovegrey Roman Blind
products.description: A modern blind doesnt have to be stark or in your face. It can be soft, tranquil and host a touch of energy, just look at this snowdrop dovegrey roman blind. Part of their scion living collection, its the collaboration between the great designers themselves and their own fabulo a modern blind doesnt have to be stark or in your face.

products.title: Animal Magic Chalk Roman Blind
products.description: From the tall giraffes to the tiny frogs, a whole kingdom of animals has come together to bring extreme cuteness and plenty of fun to your windows. The animal magic chalk roman blind is a colourful one too, with the pink of the flamingoes next to booby birds blue webbed fee from the tall giraffes to the tiny frogs, a whole kingdom of animals has come together to bring extreme cuteness and plenty of fun to your windows.

products.title: Taimi Chalk Roman Blind
products.description: Scion doesnt do anything by halves, and that includes mastering the scandinavian style. Soft, cool colours are showcased in a simple yet repetitive pattern and of course surrounded by oodles of white. Even though the design is cool, the taimi chalk roman blind feels cosy an scion doesnt do anything by halves, and that includes mastering the scandinavian style.

Part of their william morris range, in collaboration with the v&a, this design was originally created by the iconic we didnt think we could fall any more in love with the iconic strawberry thief design from william morris, until we saw this wonderful rose chalk roman blind.

products.title: Dreamcatcher Chalk Curtain
products.description: This gorgeous fabric curtain portrays a subtle glamour with metallic art deco detail that is delicately defined in this single toned design. The destiny chalk patterned curtain with its off-white colourway will soften the lines of your window and bring a graceful touch of decorative pattern. This fully lined curtain is not only stylish but a practical option for controlling natural light within your living space.

products.title: Banbury Canvas Curtain
products.description: Subtle and stylish, this curtain is ideal for enhancing a neutral scheme. The banbury canvas curtain features a clean geometric pattern of overlapping lines creating a dimensional woven effect. This design will suit a contemporary scheme or a more classic setting and features a full lining that is sure to give an elegant, quality look to the fabric. products.title: Windsor, White - Roman Blind
products.description: Pure and simple, the windsor white is the colour of snow, and adds a cool and refreshing vibe to the home without compromising on class or elegance. This light and pretty shade forms a beautiful roman blind, strengthened in appearance by the shimmering sheen of the silk-like fabric. The white can be paired with any colour combination you choose. It will look particularly attractive against a petrol blue shade to craft a contemporary nautical look in the bathroom.

products.title: Duoshade Chalk  Perfect Fit Thermal Blind
products.description: This duoshade chalk pleated blind is the ultimate all-rounder. The fresh white hue is a versatile shade that will brighten up your conservatory, leaving it feeling open and spacious. The little honeycomb pockets and aluminium strips work together to completely block out the s this duoshade chalk pleated blind is the ultimate all-rounder.

products.title: Duoshade Chalk  Perfect Fit Thermal Blind
products.description: Simple and unfussy, this duoshade chalk perfect fit blind does exactly what it says on the tin. It shades, and it gives you a completely perfect fit. With the integral frame and pleated pockets, this blind acts as a thermal barrier too, helping to keep your home cooler in summer simple and unfussy, this duoshade chalk perfect fit blind does exactly what it says on the tin.

products.title: Duoshade White Dove Perfect Fit Thermal Blind
products.description: This blind is not only ideal for bringing clean, uplifting brightness to a space, it has a whole bunch of tricks up its sleeve too. The fabric itself is cleverly designed, with honeycomb pleats that trap the air and insulate the room, as well as deadening sound from outside. B this blind is not only ideal for bringing clean, uplifting brightness to a space, it has a whole bunch of tricks up its sleeve too.

products.title: Duoshade White Dove Perfect Fit Thermal Blind
products.description: The perfect fit duoshade white dove is a funny one. In some lights its a stark white, in others it has undertones of the gentlest grey. One thing is for sure; its a wonderful shade. Its packed with practical benefits too. Its blackout, a great thermal barrier, a doddle to fi the perfect fit duoshade white dove is a funny one.

products.title: Skye Ultra White (Blackout)
products.description: The elegant silver or white fascia and side channels house roller fabric discreetly within the roof window. Skye roof blinds have been designed to fit velux, rooflite, keylite, fakro and dakstra roof windows. Offering optimum light control each blind can be positioned effortlessly to sit at any desired point within the side channels. All parts are supplied to fit the blind direct to your choice of branded skylight window.
